query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sg.*, st.name as study_name, gct.name as type_name FROM study_group_class sg, study st, group_class_types gct WHERE sg.group_class_type_id=gct.group_class_type_id AND sg.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) ORDER BY sg.name asc

query.name: findAllActiveByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sg.*, st.name as study_name, gct.name as type_name FROM study_group_class sg, study st, group_class_types gct WHERE sg.group_class_type_id=gct.group_class_type_id AND sg.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND sg.status_id=1 ORDER BY sg.name asc

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO study_group_class (STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID,NAME,STUDY_ID,OWNER_ID,DATE_CREATED, GROUP_CLASS_TYPE_ID, STATUS_ID,subject_assignment) VALUES (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE study_group_class SET NAME=?,STUDY_ID=?, GROUP_CLASS_TYPE_ID=?, STATUS_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=?,UPDATE_ID=?,subject_assignment=? WHERE STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID=?

query.name: getCurrentPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT study_group_class_id_seq.currval AS key from dual

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: SELECT study_group_class_id_seq.nextval AS key from dual
